boardgame.name: Dungeon Degenerates: Hand of Doom
boardgame.description: Dungeon Degenerates: Hand of Doom takes place in the Dark Fantasy Realm of the decaying Eastern Provinces of the W_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;rstreich. Players take escaped criminal adventurers on unsavory missions through four distinct regions, each with their own monsters _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; encounters. As the players explore the W_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;rstreich, danger levels rise continuously across the map. Players must complete their mission before the Hand of Doom descends on the board, unleashing evil magic on the land._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dungeon Degenerates is for 1-4 players co-op. Players can form parties or split up throughout the game at will; there is no obligation to stick together. Game play is 1-3 hours based on mission. Dungeon Degenerates has an epic RPG campaign feel in an open world sandbox board game, and you bring your experience _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; items from previous missions. There are multiple missions _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; objectives of varying difficulty with multiple ways to approach each mission. Dungeon Degenerates is set in a cohesive _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; fixed world with multiple distinct regions which feature unique encounters _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; thematic monsters. Encounters allow multiple interaction choices; you do not have to fight everyone you see. Play features an open experience system allowing for character customization with new skills. You are always in danger - the town is not an artificial safe zone - combat is dangerous. There are various modes of travel - players cooperate to choose their route _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; pace, or split up _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; fend for themselves. Dungeon Degenerates features streamlined combat with tactical depth; each player rolls dice only once on their turn, using standard 6-sided dice only. There are over 100 monsters with unique abilities _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; artwork._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling a like new copy of Dungeon Degenerates. This has not been played but has only been opened and punched to reduce weight and to check components. This comes along with the KS Exclusive characters Infamous Butcher and Angle of Death along with their cards and standees. This will also come with the Dice Bag and additional dice for all players to have their own, as well as the hand of doom miniature; the mini comes in 2 parts. No additional cost for shipping, but will only ship within the United States through USPS. If you have any questions please reach out to me and I will be happy to answer them. Shipping will happen after paypal payment has processed.
KS Edition with the exclusive Hand of Doom miniature included. Item is heavy, over two kg, Will always look for cheapest possible shipping. Contact us for a quote.

I have opened up and played once. AWESOME! I do need to sell it at $10 below retail as I have family emergency and I need to conserve money. Everything is in excellent condition. It can be played solo if you like quite easily. This is retail version

This sale includes: - Dungeon Degenerates base game (https://www.boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/210232) - One resin miniature of the Hand of Doom Both are still sealed. My apologies for the high price, but that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s what i paid for it (including shipping) :/. i will reduce the price by 5 Euros if the buyer picks up the package from me (in Geltendorf, Germany), rather than having it shipped. Package ships from Germany and weighs approx. 3kg. Payment is expected within 24 hours of sale confirmation or I reserve the right to cancel the sale. Please make any inquiries about the item prior to purchasing.

Up for sale is my copy of: Dungeon Degenerates: Hand of Doom. Also included is the expansion for the base game: Dungeon Degenerates: Hand of Doom Adventurer Expansion. A few notes; my copy was originally missing the Bloodlust skill card. The publisher is in the process of sending me a new one. When I get it, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll forward it on to the buyer. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve printed out a copy of the skill card in the meantime, so the skill can be used while playing. I played my copy two times, and didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t get very far. The game is complete (except for the soon-to-be-replaced Bloodlust skill card), and in excellent shape. I will only ship to Canada and the US. Shipping to Canada will be $22, and to the US $28.
